text: Bivio was a municipality in the district of Albula in the canton of Graubünden in Switzerland. On 1 January 2016, the former municipalities of Bivio, Cunter, Marmorera, Mulegns, Riom-Parsonz, Salouf, Savognin, Sur and Tinizong-Rona merged into the new municipality of Surses. ==Other websites== * Official website of Bivio Category:Former municipalities of Graubünden
title: Bivio
